item.title: 1: Trebuchet?!
item.description: Day 1: Trebuchet?! # Part 1 # The Problem # The input is comprised of lines of text where each line contains a “calibration value”. To find the calibration value in each line, find the first and last digit contained on each line. The first and last number of each line will form a two digit number The answer is the sum of every two digit number. For example:
